data.comment: The match has started, with St. Truidense kicking-off.
Nikolaos Kenourgios is booked for the home team.
In the minute 13, Ibrahima Sory Sankhon for St. Truidense has been booked by Wesli De Cremer and receives a first yellow card.
Pol Garcia is on a sub for Ibrahima Sory Sankhon for St. Truidense.
The first-half has come to a close in Waregem.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway. Zulte with the kick-off.
Zulte make their first substitution with Bassem Srarfi replacing Nikolaos Kenourgios.
William Bianda (Zulte) has received a yellow card from Wesli De Cremer.
In the minute 56, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Yuma Suzuki.
William Bianda (Zulte) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
Steve De Ridder (St. Truidense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 78, Stefaan Van Winckel is making the team's second substitution at Regenboogstadion with Oleksandr Filippov replacing Yuma Suzuki.
Abdoulaye Sissako is replacing Daniel Opare for the home team.
The home team replace Ewoud Pletinckx with Panagiotis Armenakas.
In the minute 84, St. Truidense make their third substitution with Chris Durkin replacing Facundo Colidio.
At Regenboogstadion, Jelle Vossen has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-2.
Maximiliano Caufriez puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
